attributes.action: Relieve British Airways as Britain's 'Flag Carrier'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decline of service (and respect) has now made British Airways status a joke as 'The world's (least) favourite airline.'

I petition that the Carrier be awarded to another company that shows Britain in a better light.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
